Statute.Title: Trust and Loan Companies Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Sociétés de fiducie et de prêt, Loi sur les)

Section.Text: added, 1997, c. 15, s. 348; 2005, c. 54, s. 392 as amended by 2022, c. 10, s. 231 (English)
[1997, c. 15, s. 351 intended to amend s. 167 by replacing s. 167(2) but that amendment was repealed before coming into force by 2001, c. 9, s. 499]

CIF.Text: CIF, 1991, c. 45, except ss. 250(1) and (2) in force 01.06.92 see SI/92‑89; ss. 250(1) and (2) shall come into force on the day that is six months after the coming into force of ss. 243(1) and (2) see ss. 563(2) (in force 01.12.92)

Item.Text: — the definition of “minor” in s. 2 of the Trust and Loan Companies Act, as enacted by s. 368(2), ss. 371 to 375, s. 379(2), ss. 380, 398 to 400, 407 to 414, 417, 435 and 439 to 451 in force 27.04.2005 see SI/2006‑68

— the definitions “going-private transaction” and “squeeze-out transaction” in s. 2 of the Trust and Loan Companies Act, as enacted by s. 368(2), ss. 368(3), 369, 370, 377 and 378, 379(1), 381 to 391, 392(1) and (3), 393, 395 to 397, 401 to 406, 415, 416, 418 to 433, 437 and 438 in force 28.11.2006 see SI/2006-140
— ss. 368(1) and 394 repealed before coming into force 31.12.2018 see 2008, c. 20, s. 3
— s. 376, repealed by 2007, c. 6, s. 391
— ss. 434, 436 and 452 in force 01.06.2011 see SOR/2010-229 and Erratum, SI/2010-86, Canada Gazette, Part II, Vol. 144, No. 24, p. 2264 re registration number

CIF.Text: CIF, 2006, c. 4, s. 202 in force on assent 22.06.2006

Item.Text: — ss. 337 to 342, 344 to 357 and 359 to 361, the portion of s. 425(3) before par. (a) and par. 425(3)(b) of the Trust and Loan Companies Act, as enacted by s. 362, ss. 364, 366 to 385 and 451 in force 20.04.2007 see SI/2007-49
— s. 362 repealed before coming into force, 31.12.2021, see 2008, c. 20, s. 3
